top_comments.comment: Omg I Subscribed at 20k and in a week You have 235k, can’t wait to see these critters have more fun

My hamster ( before she died a few days ago) hated hamster mazes lol. The lil hamsters look nice and healthy :) keep up the good work :) but maybe next time don’t use the spinning box thing hamsters easily get dizzy.

comments_since_last_sample.body: The lesson of this video: Keep going and never look back!
The hamsters are good at this
I loved the squid game one
Not the  hamster 🐹 dogging his/her’s every day life obstacles,..  sounds familiar!!!!!
Imagine going in his house and all you see is hamsters and mazes
